item.title: James Smith - Call Me When It's Over
item.description:
I heard you’re
seeing someone new
And I hope
he treats you good
But if I dare
to tell the truth
Hope it don’t go
the way it should
Hope he don’t treat
you like I could
So call me
when it’s over
Tell me
when you’re done
And I can be the
I can be the shoulder
The shoulder to cry on
a heart to rely on
Woo woo woo
woo woo woo
I know at times
I made mistakes
Wish I could blow
them all away
Won’t you believe me
when I say
I’m so much better
now I’ve changed
I’ve only got myself
to blame mmm
Call me
when it’s over
Tell me
when you’re done
And I can be the
I can be the shoulder
The shoulder to cry on
a heart to rely on
Woo woo woo
woo woo woo
Woo woo woo
woo woo woo
Oh call me
when it’s over
Tell me
when you’re done
I can
be the shoulder
The shoulder to cry on
a heart to rely on
Call me
when it’s over
Tell me
when you’re done
I can
be the shoulder
The shoulder to cry on
a heart to rely on
